[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Epic Meal Time is a popular YouTube cooking show known for creating extremely high-calorie meals, generally out of meat products (with particular emphasis on bacon). It debuted in October 2010, and since then has started to release an episode every Tuesday and boasts a subscriber count of 7 million.

Epic Meal Time turned to A Nerd’s World in 2018 to cook up a tasty, zesty, and spicy new website. Our goal was to increase YouTube video views and subscribers, promote their other YouTube channels and increase products sales online.

Return to our Web Development Portfolio & Pricing[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
